trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides a multilevel switch to control tracing and debug output without recompiling your code.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name to display on a user interface.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name to display on a user interface.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the trace level that determines the messages the switch allows.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the switch allows error-handling messages.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the switch allows informational messages.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the switch allows all messages.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether the switch allows warning messages.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Updates and corrects the level for this switch.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
